728800f-a.title: Richmond: Douglas Road - Emerson Drive
728800f-a.text:
Douglas Road, north side, west of Enerson Drive, showing the
Webster residence.
Auaust 7, 1932.
P.L. Aperr
NO REPRODUCTIONs.

728799f-b.title: Richmond: Douglas Road - Emerson Drive
728799f-b.text:
(1)
Douglas Road, north side, between Emerson Drive and Milden
Ave., showing the Philosopher's Retreat, a log cabin built by
direction of C.0. Kolff on his psoperty. It was destroyed by fire
in 1917. For additional data see ''The New York Times', February 4,
1917, section 3, page 4.
November 24, 1910.
By Wm. T. Davis through P.L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(2)
A view from the opposite direction.
November 24, 1910.
By Wm. T. Davis through P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(3)
An additional view at a later date.
August 31, 1913.
By Wm. T. Davis through P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
728799f-b.folder: Douglas Road & Emerson Drive, Staten Island, NY
